name: lunar
description: Lunar is a headless eCommerce platform for Laravel developers. It offers advanced catalog management, custom product types, carts, checkout APIs, and a customizable admin interface for complete flexibility.

features.title: REST API
features.description: API-first architecture, Custom frontends, Flexible integration. Build any shopping experience

features.title: Product Management
features.description: Custom product types, Variant support, Inventory tracking. Manage complex product catalogs

features.title: Cart & Checkout
features.description: Shopping cart APIs, Checkout workflows, Payment integration. Complete eCommerce functionality

features.title: Order Management
features.description: Order processing, Fulfillment tracking, Customer orders. Handle the entire order lifecycle

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Customizable dashboard, Product management, Order processing. Manage your store efficiently

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Plugin system, Custom fields, Event hooks. Extend functionality to match your needs
